item.title: Maintenance Notification
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: Scheduled maintenance is in progress. Access to the Ben web app and mobile app will be unavailable for a limited time. Some transaction notifications may be delayed.

Dec 11, 23:45 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has now been completed.
Thank you for your patience while we make these performance improvements.

Dec 11, 23:42 GMT
Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.

Dec 11, 23:01 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 7, 12:28 GMT
Scheduled - We are always working to increase the reliability of our platform. As part of some upcoming improvements, we would like to make you aware of some planned maintenance work.

This maintenance has been scheduled for:
23:00 (GMT) on Monday 11th December until 00:00 (GMT) on Tuesday 12th December.

During this time, access to the Ben web app and mobile app will be unavailable to all employees and admins.

Any payments made using flexible allowance cards during this time will not be affected. However, please note that some transaction notifications may be delayed.

We will also be notifying employees ahead of the maintenance work, and you can stay up-to-date with the status of upcoming and in-progress scheduled downtime here.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any concerns.
